text:
To Shower Blessings Upon The Newlyweds, PM Modi Arrives At Priyanka-Nick's Delhi Reception
To Shower Blessings Upon The Newlyweds, PM Modi Arrives At Priyanka-Nick's Delhi Reception
“It was all tears. All tears,” Priyanka Chopra said about the emotional roller coaster ride that her wedding was with Nick Jonas.
As she posted her first pictures from the wedding today, she wrote, “And the forever starts now” and fans were left swooning over them both.
After saying the vows, it is party time for Priyanka and Nick. The lovebirds are throwing their first wedding reception party in Delhi which will see an amalgamation of all the big names including politicians, fashion designers as well as businessmen.
The party has begun, and here’s the first glimpse of the newly-weds.
#1
Viral Bhayani
#2
Viral Bhayani
#3
Viral Bhayani
Don't Miss 7.9 K SHARES 365 SHARES 161 SHARES 769 SHARES 182 SHARES

Priyanka Chopra donned an ivory coloured lehenga and Nick opted for a blue suit. Don’t they look perfect together? Lots of love and happiness to the adorable couple!
title: To Shower Blessings Upon The Newlyweds, PM Modi Arrives At Priyanka-Nick's Delhi Reception
description: After saying the vows, it is party time for Priyanka and Nick. The lovebirds are throwing their first wedding reception party in Delhi which will see an amalgamation of all the big names including politicians, fashion designers as well as businessmen.
